summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department and authorizing execution of acceptance of a quitclaim deed from the United States of America, acting by and through the Secretary of Health, Education and Welfare, acting by and through the Regional Director for Region X of the Department of Health, Education and Welfare, to certain property in the northeast one-quarter of the northeast one-quarter of the southeast one-quarter of Section 3, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W.M., King County, Washington, for public health (water reservoir) purposes.
